Invicro | Software Engineer, Test Engineer, Project Manager | Boston | Onsite/Visa | Full-Time | invicro.com

I am the Director of Analysis Software and I am working on growing our team. Come make an impact at Invicro, a dynamic and growing life sciences company. We are seeking energetic, technical and creative professionals in a variety of positions. If you enjoy challenging and analytical work and feel motivated by the idea that together we can fulfill our mission to visualize and quantify biological and pathological processes to better diagnose, characterize, prevent, treat and cure disease, please contact me (tobon at invicro dot com) or apply directly to the posting.
